metadata.title: CVE-2016-4216 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: XMPCore in Adobe XMP Toolkit for Java before 5.1.3 allows remote attackersto read arbitrary files via XML data containing an external entitydeclaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to an XMLExternal Entity (XXE) issue.

criterions.comment: libxmpcore-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
